item.title: Best Mechanical Keyboards for Gaming
item.description: Whether competing professionally in eSports competitions or playing Fortnite on the weekends, a mechanical keyboard can really step up your game.

item.title: Comparing Mechanical Keyboard Switches
item.description: Switch selection makes a huge difference in a mechanical keyboard. Start with our complete guide to mechanical keyboard switches to learn what's best for you.

item.title: Comparing Mechanical Keyboard Layout Sizes
item.description: Shopping for mechanical keyboards can be exhausting. Nail down the keyboard layout size that best fits your needs to narrow down the search early.
